item.title: A Few Simple Questions
item.dc:creator: @sic_pure sic pure
item.description:
@sic_pure wrote:

How can I make an NPC hit more than one? And when I add stuff to my npcdrops.cfg it doesn’t drop anything…

npcdrop = 2025 0 4708 1 4710 1 4712 1 4714 1 [ENDOFNPCDROPLIST] whats wrong with this? Also I Tried making Falador non wild…

public boolean nonWild() { if((absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3258 && absY >= 3438 && absY <=3431 ) ||(absX >= 3073 && absX <= 3106 && absY >=3243 && absY <=3271 )|| (absX >= 2668 && absX <= 2683 && absY >= 3414 && absY <= 3429) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3260 && absY >=3435 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >= 3249 && absX <= 3253 && absY >=3431 && absY <=3437 ) || (absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 ) ||(absX >=3250 && absX <=3257 && absY >=3419 && absY <=3423 )|| (absX >=2363 && absX <=2317 && absY >=3196 && absY <=3150 )|| (absX >= 3068 && absX <= 2934 && absY >= 3391 && absY <=3304 ) || heightLevel == 1) return true; else return false; }

Read full topic
